TopicTitle: Remove one letter from a game title and describe the new game in a single line

Articles.Content:
Gay's Mod: A game where you use open-source coding and modding to promote pride and acceptance of LGBT people in the gaming community (too political? hopefully not)

Rain Simulator 2014: A game about ruining parades, ending droughts, and staying inside and reading

Elite: Angerous: You're angry and you have a spaceship

Flappy Bid: An infuriating game about auctions

Pc-man: Eat apples and linuxes (penguins?) while avoiding the console fanghosts

Super Smash Bros Bawl: A game featuring all your favourite nintendo characters as they watch Rachel Getting Married and have a good cry
0x10 without "C": Minecraft
Grand Heft Auto: it takes a lot to lift a car.
Oat Simulator: Your dreams of being a plant are now satisfied.
Ace of pades: Play with IPads instead shovels
Mineraft: Mine. In a raft!

staround: a game about about Don't starve HHHHound ^^

( (((((( (( yet (((( ))) )
I AM READ: Adventures of the Illiterate

X-Wig Alliance: Time has come to grow some hair on your chest, or on your shiny top. Beat up all those meanies calling you a pool ball.

Loo: For reasons known only to deranged game developers, you must unclog the pipes using only a flute.

Waxwoks: Try your best cooking up a meal with pans made of heat non-resistent material.
Tomb Rider - Subduing and mounting the world's most temperamental tombs.

Battefield = Run around in a field od bats.

Edited December 4, 2016 by NSEP
System Sock:  FPS that has you vainly searching for the one sock that always goes missing from the wash...

MineRaft. A game about mining and rafts.

Wait dang. Already chosen! Uhhhhhhh.

Plane coaster. A game about planes coasting simulator.

Edited December 5, 2016 by Firemetal

Rus. game about russian guys

(Rust)

Aid Over Moscow: Deliver much needed cheese without being shot down.

Solo Fight: Fight yourself.

Bobby Fisher Teaches Hess: Bobby teaches some basic dos and don'ts. Can he succeed?
Tem fortress 2 HOI! I'm Temmie! Velcom to our fort!

Porta 

A puzzle game that involves using Porta-Pottys to complete test chambers and defeat an evil AI.

(Portal)
Geometry Ash: A game about making shapes out of ash without the piles collapsing...

Sains Row let's play as Sans and Papyrus's lost brother

Edited December 12, 2016 by TedwinKnockman66

Cites: Skylines: So in this upcoming game, your world is now a barren wasteland full of large structures. The only way you can survive and keep your sanity... is to cite everything wrong with skyhigh buildings. Deadpool is with you too to help you cite buildings. You even get a free gun which shoots citations at the zombies that drop from the citation required buildings...
Irates! :  new RTS where your team runs around and screams obscenities at office workers, drivers, delivery men, cashiers....hell, just about everyone!
Mincraft: A game about minimal-sized Crafting
Undetale: A tale about underwear
BioSock - cartoony kids game where you are a sock that has to...i dunno...tidy your room and do the washing? Maybe a personal hygiene minigame?
